tp:treatment-sec.p: Remarks. For material examined and redescription, see Ahrens (2004a) . The distribution of this species is mainly in northern India and the lower Himalaya ( Ahrens 2004a , 2006); in China , it is known only from Ta-tsien-lu, the type locality of Serica tsienluana Brenske, 1897 . No recent records are known.
Distribution. See map ( Fig. 90 ) and Table 1 .
